title: Great Masquerade, The, Murder On The Emerald Seas 1974 Kaye Stevens Judy La Scala, Anya Ormsby, Roberts Blossom, Lee Sandman, Johnny Weissmuler, Henny Youngman, Mike Joyce, Robbin Young, Fern Tarr, Reggi Lynn + Alan Ormsby

sources.title: Great Masquerade, The, Murder On The Emerald Seas 1974 Kaye Stevens Judy La Scala, Anya Ormsby, Roberts Blossom, Lee Sandman, Johnny Weissmuler, Henny Youngman, Mike Joyce, Robbin Young, Fern Tarr, Reggi Lynn + Alan Ormsby
sources.description: Three women from a beauty pageant are murdered so the organizers move the show to a cruise ship named Emerald Seas. Rather than sending a female cop along, the local police decide to send a male cop in drag. You'll know which one he is as he has chin stubble and always looks like he needs a shave. The movie does give Roberts Blossom a good chance to show off his rather dated wardrobe. IMDB shows Great Masquerade while the movie itself has a title screen of Murder on the Emerald Seas.
